expressions.en: Let me know if you need anything.
expressions.cn: 如果您需要什么，请告诉我。
expressions.bm_formal: Maklumkan kepada saya jika ada apa-apa yang diperlukan.
Saya mohon maaf atas kelewatan ini.

work.scenario: You need to request the latest sales report from a colleague and offer assistance if they face issues.
key_phrases: Sila hantar kepada saya laporan jualan terkini.
Saya akan susulan jika belum terima.
Maklumkan kepada saya jika ada apa-apa yang diperlukan.

life.scenario: You're planning an outing with friends and need to confirm details, apologizing for your late reply.
key_phrases: Bagitahu je kalau ada apa-apa soalan.

tech.scenario: You've reported a bug to the IT support and want to confirm they understood, offering more details if needed.
key_phrases: Saya akan *follow up* dengan pasukan teknikal.

quiz_toggle.question: How do you formally say 'Please send me the report'?
quiz_toggle.answer: Sila hantar kepada saya laporan itu.
